sqlMap.sql: MATERIAL_ID, NAME, QUANTITY, UNIT, DESCRIPTION, ENTRUST_ID,QUANTITY2,QUANTITY3,MATERIAL_TYPE,BIANHAO,APPEND_MATERIAL_ID, ATTACH_FILE, ATTACH_FILE_BLOBID, JIAN_HOU_CHULI_TYPE, SAVE_CONDITON, REMARK, JIAN_HOU_STORE_TIME, SAVE_ADDRESS, BAR_CODE,TQ_INFO,TIQU_FILE,TIQU_FILE_BLOBID
sqlMap.select:
select
from SF_MATERIALS where ENTRUST_ID = #entrustId:DECIMAL# order by bianhao
sqlMap.insert: insert into SF_MATERIALS (MATERIAL_ID, NAME, QUANTITY, UNIT, DESCRIPTION, ENTRUST_ID,QUANTITY2,QUANTITY3,MATERIAL_TYPE,BIANHAO,APPEND_MATERIAL_ID, ATTACH_FILE, ATTACH_FILE_BLOBID, JIAN_HOU_CHULI_TYPE, SAVE_CONDITON, REMARK, JIAN_HOU_STORE_TIME, SAVE_ADDRESS, BAR_CODE,TQ_INFO,TIQU_FILE,TIQU_FILE_BLOBID ) values (#materialId:DECIMAL#, #name:VARCHAR#, #quantity:DECIMAL#, #unit:VARCHAR#, #description:VARCHAR#, #entrustId:DECIMAL#, #quantity2:DECIMAL#,#quantity3#,#materialType#,#bianhao#, #appendMaterialId:DECIMAL#, #attachFile:VARCHAR#, #attachFileBlobid:VARCHAR#, #jianHouChuliType:VARCHAR#, #saveConditon:VARCHAR#, #remark:VARCHAR#, #jianHouStoreTime:DECIMAL#, #saveAddress:VARCHAR#, #barCode:VARCHAR#,#tqInfo#,#tiquFile#,#tiquFileBlobid# )
sqlMap.update: update SF_MATERIALS set NAME = #name:VARCHAR#, QUANTITY = #quantity:DECIMAL#, QUANTITY2 = #quantity2:DECIMAL#, QUANTITY3= #quantity3#, UNIT = #unit:VARCHAR#, DESCRIPTION = #description:VARCHAR#, ENTRUST_ID = #entrustId:DECIMAL#, MATERIAL_TYPE=#materialType#, BIANHAO=#bianhao#, APPEND_MATERIAL_ID=#appendMaterialId:DECIMAL#, ATTACH_FILE = #attachFile:VARCHAR#, ATTACH_FILE_BLOBID = #attachFileBlobid:VARCHAR#, JIAN_HOU_CHULI_TYPE = #jianHouChuliType:VARCHAR#, SAVE_CONDITON = #saveConditon:VARCHAR#, REMARK = #remark:VARCHAR#, JIAN_HOU_STORE_TIME = #jianHouStoreTime:DECIMAL#, SAVE_ADDRESS = #saveAddress:VARCHAR#, BAR_CODE = #barCode:VARCHAR#, TQ_INFO=#tqInfo#, TIQU_FILE=#tiquFile#, TIQU_FILE_BLOBID=#tiquFileBlobid# where MATERIAL_ID = #materialId:DECIMAL#
